channel.description: Random thoughts, cool tools, links from the infochimps dev team
channel.title: Infochimps Dev Blog - Rails, Ruby, Data

item.title: How to create datasets that the rest of the world needs
item.description:
How to create datasets that the rest of the world needs:

We recently created a dataset for the web site that is a map between IP addresses to zip codes and census demographic information. The work that was involved in this is representative of the type of…
